product.title: Stellar Drift
product.description: Stellar Drift is a space exploration game that combines realistic orbital mechanics with supernatural horror. Players navigate through an accurately modeled solar system while uncovering ancient artifacts and cosmic entities that challenge their perception of reality.
product.history: Originally conceived during a game jam in 2022, Stellar Drift evolved from a simple orbital mechanics simulator into a full-fledged narrative experience. The game spent 18 months in development, with continuous input from both the gaming community and scientific advisors.

features.feature: Accurate orbital mechanics and space physics
Multiple endings based on scientific discoveries
VR support with real-time star mapping
Educational mode with real astronomy lessons

award.info: NASA Science Games Showcase, Cape Canaveral, December 2023

quote.description: Finally, a space game that doesn't ignore the laws of physics! Stellar Drift makes orbital mechanics not just accurate, but genuinely fun.
The perfect blend of scientific accuracy and cosmic horror. Stellar Drift will make you look at the stars differently.
